title: Roberts Extends Freeze on House’s Attempt to Obtain Trump’s Tax Returns
description: The move further delays an oversight request by the House Ways and Means Committee from 2019 as the midterm election looms.
category: House Committee on Ways and Means
media:credit: Bridget Bennett for The New York Times
media:description: Lawyers for former President Donald J. Trump had asked the Supreme Court on Monday to block a House committee from obtaining his tax returns.
